name: Initialize WDS Project
description: Initialize WDS project configuration and select design methodology path

name: Project Analysis
description: Analyze existing project to understand design needs and current state

name: Product Exploration
description: Define vision positioning and success criteria for your product

name: User Research
description: Connect business goals to user psychology and triggers

name: UX Design
description: Define HOW it works - functionality interactions and content structure

name: Design System
description: Define HOW it looks - brand expression visual language and design tokens (can start anytime)

name: Design Deliveries
description: Create design delivery specifications and test scenarios for development handoff

name: Saga Analyst
description: Strategic business analyst for product discovery and analysis. Creates Product Brief and Trigger Map.

name: Idunn PM
description: Product manager for requirements and planning. Handles Platform Requirements and handoff coordination.

name: Freya Designer
description: UX/UI designer for creating user experiences and visual designs. Handles UX Design Design System and Deliveries.

name: Mimir Orchestrator
description: Teaching orchestrator who guides you through WDS methodology and workflow selection.

name: Quick Prototype Path
description: Rapid iteration path for quick prototyping and validation

name: Full Product Path
description: Complete design process for new products (all phases)

name: Design System Only
description: Focus on brand identity and design system without product work

name: Digital Strategy
description: Discovery and strategy focus without full implementation
